survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with on-site childcare facilities provided by the company, identifying areas for improvement and overall effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to assess usage frequency.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare facilities do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple valuable aspects.

script.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare facilities do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: Has the availability of on-site childcare facilities influenced your decision to remain with the company?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess retention impact.

script.question_text: Has the availability of on-site childcare facilities influenced your decision to remain with the company?
